import React from "react" export const dropdownControlled = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    ButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class Dropdowncontrolled extends React.Component {

    state = {
      dropdownOpen: false
    }

    togggleDropdown = () => {
      this.setState({
        dropdownOpen: !this.state.dropdownOpen
      })
    }

    render() {
      return(
        

          
          
            Controlled
            
            
          
            Header
            Action
            Another Action
            
            Another Action
          
        
        

      )
    }
  }
  export default Dropdowncontrolled
  `}
) export const dropdownUncontrolled = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {

  class DropdownUncontrolled extends React.Component {
    render() {
      return(

            Another Action
            
            Another Action
          
        
        

      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownUncontrolled
  `}
) export const dropdownBasic = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownBasic extends React.Component {

    render() {
      return(
        

        
          
            Primary
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3

            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3

            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      


      

        
          
            Danger
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      


      

        
          
            Warning
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      


      

        
          
            Light
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      


      

        
          
            Dark
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      

      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownBasic
  `}
) export const dropdownSplit = ( 
    
      {`

  import {

    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownSplit extends React.Component {
    render() {
      return(
        

          
            
            
            
              
            Option 1

              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
            
            
            
            Option 1
              Option 2
              Option 3
            
          
        

      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownSplit
  `}
) export const dropdownOutline = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownOutline extends React.Component {

    render() {
      return(
        

        
          
            Primary
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2

) export const dropdownFlat = (

  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,

) export const dropdownGradient = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem

  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownGradient extends React.Component {


    render() {

) export const dropdownSizes = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem,
    Row,
    Col
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownSizes extends React.Component {

    render() {
      return(
        
        
          

            
              
                Large
                
                
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          

          

            
              
                Default
                
                
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          

          

            
              
                Small
                
                
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          

        
        
          

            
              
              
                
              
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          
{" "}
          

            
              
              
                
              
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          
{" "}
          

            
              
              
                
              
              
                Option 1
                Option 2
                Option 3
              
            
          

        
      
      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownSizes
  `}
) export const dropdownDirections = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem,
    Row,
    Col
  } from "reactstrap"
  import { ChevronDown } from "react-feather"
  class DropdownDirections extends React.Component {

    render() {
      return(
        

        
          
            Drop bottom right
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      

      

        
          
            Drop Up
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      

      

        
          
            Drop Right
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      

      

        
          
            Drop Left
            
            
          
            Option 1
            Option 2
            Option 3
          
        
      

      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownDirections
  `}
) export const dropdownVariations = ( 
    
      {`
  import React from "react"
  import {
    Button,
    Form,
    FormGroup,
    Label,
    Input,
    UncontrolledButtonDropdown,
    DropdownToggle,
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownItem,

  } from "reactstrap"

  import {
    Eye,
    Code,
    Wifi,
    WifiOff,
    PhoneOff,
    BellOff,
    Bell,
    VolumeX,
    Volume2,
    ChevronDown
  } from "react-feather"

  const icons = [
    {
      id: 1,
      item: 
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      item: 
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      item: 
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      item: 
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      item: 
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      item: 
    }
  ]


  class DropdownVariations extends React.Component {

    state = {
      dropdownOpen: false,
      activeIcon: 
    }


  toggleIcon = icon => {
    this.setState({ activeIcon: icon })
  }


    render() {

      const iconItem = icons.map(icon => {
        return (
           this.toggleIcon(icon.item)}
          >
            {icon.item}
          
        )
      })
      return(
        

          
            
              Group
              
              
            
              Group 1
              Option 1
              Option 2
              
              Group 2
              Option 1
              Option 2
              
              Group 3
              Option 1
              Option 2
            
          
        

        

          
            
            
              {this.state.activeIcon}
            
            {iconItem}
          
        

        

          
            
              Form
              
              
            
              

                
                  
                  
                
                
                  
                  
                
                
                  

                    
                    
                  

                
                
              

              
              
                {" "}
                New around here? Sign up
              
              
                {" "}
                Forgot password?
              
            
          
        

      )
    }
  }
  export default DropdownVariations
  `}
)
